import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import ReactDOM from'react-dom/client';import'./MusicPlayer.css';import DefaultAlbumArt from'./Images/DefaultAlbumArt.png';//'../Images/albumCover.webp';
import Play from'./Images/play.svg';import Pause from'./Images/pause.svg';import SkipNext from'./Images/skip-next.svg';import SkipPrev from'./Images/skip-prev.svg';import AlbumImgs from'../AlbumImages';import AlbumData from'../AlbumData.js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MusicPlayer(_ref){let{PlayOrPauseFunc,IsPaused,AlbumID=-1,NextSongFunc,PrevSongFunc}=_ref;function PlayPauseHandle(){PlayOrPauseFunc();}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"MusicPlayer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"SongImage",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:AlbumID==-1?DefaultAlbumArt:AlbumImgs[AlbumID]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"SongDetails",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:AlbumID==-1?"Nothing Playing":AlbumData[AlbumID][0]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:AlbumID==-1?"-":AlbumData[AlbumID][1]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Btns",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Prev",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:SkipPrev,onClick:()=>PrevSongFunc()})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Play",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:IsPaused?Play:Pause,onClick:()=>PlayPauseHandle()})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Next",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:SkipNext,onClick:()=>NextSongFunc()})})]})]});}export default MusicPlayer;
